mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(smenu.method,'|',smenu.url) FROM sys_user suser LEFT JOIN sys_user_role surole ON suser.user_id = surole.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role srole ON surole.role_id=srole.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srmenu ON srole.role_id=srmenu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu smenu ON srmenu.menu_id=smenu.menu_id where suser.user_id = #{userId}
